extendedInfo.description: Smartphone "Transformation" Project - dodol launcherThe Dodol Launcher allows users to decorate the Android phone home screen and the background of app drawers, which contains the user's apps, to create a more "customized" smartphone.Users can change their smartphone's home screen and background/icon/widget designs of their app drawers at once (depending on the theme they select).Transform your smartphone easily with the dodol launcher! *** Why is dodol launcher So Special?***1) A wide variety of themes are being created this very moment! - Smartphones can be "customized" to best represent the owner by selecting from a wide selection of themes, that range from cute and cuddle, simple themes to more vibrant and sophisticated themes. Go to Google Play Store, Naver App Store and Theme store and select a theme of your choice. - Don't miss the new fun themes that are updated continuously!- GO launcher themes can also be applied. (Paid themes are excluded)2) Offers a convenient default widget and widget theme modification function  -  The memory cleaner/shortcut setting widget, which is already used by many users, can be used instantly without having to install all widgets separately.  - Change the launcher theme and the widget design will be modified as well!. (How nice!)3) Change the font, ringtone and keyboard settings as you see fit - Dodol Launcher is different! While other launchers only decorate the home screen, Dodol Launcher allows users to modify fonts, ringtones and keyboards so that it meets the user's taste.  - Users can select from a wide variety of fonts, ringtones and keyboard themes. 4) And..  - Offers detailed functions for screen rotation/individual icons/folders etc..  - Supports functions in a convenient and stable manner by copying the home screen and creating backups of settings.

reviews.title: One complaint
reviews.comment: There is no privacy with this app, you have to have permission to put widgets on your home screen,I don\'t like the fact that you can look at everything I post and have access to my location. So I guess no widgets displayed for me,I believe I should have at least some privacy.there is no need to know my location,my phone calls,my messages and what I do on the internet.
reviews.author: Jessica Ciferri

reviews.title: very me!:D
reviews.comment: So far,this is the best launcher for me.It\'s very easy to use,u have lots of cute themes,and very customable ;)
reviews.author: Octavina Vidya

reviews.title: Best launcher out there!!
reviews.comment: This is the best launcher I\'ve tried yet it\'s brilliant :) pls pls pls make a lock screen app and a messaging one too.
reviews.author: Sammy Sung

reviews.title: Not bad.
reviews.comment: Sometimes FC. The icons are very nice looking.
reviews.author: Alvin Wong Vee Lin

reviews.title: Widgets in the dock?! Fantastic!!
reviews.comment: I thought I would never stray from nova launcher. This launcher is so well developed that I can\'t see myself going back.
reviews.author: Dan Meyer

reviews.title: Works well on my samsung grand duos
reviews.comment: 1 word to describe this app \"Fantastic\":)
reviews.author: Marianne Lim

reviews.title: Simply amazing!
reviews.comment: Working perfectly on android 4.3, looks so nice, will give 5 stars when feature to modify drawer names like in nova launcher,i dont just like having \"all,recent,ect\" other than that, most amazing launcher ive seen yet, pls keep updating!
reviews.author: Marcel dos santos

reviews.title: WOW
reviews.comment: II honestly have passed over this launcher time and time again because I thought it was a go clone now that I have tried it I am going to keep it because I love the widgets in the dock and it is so super fast I also like the shortcuts in the drawer it\'s so perfect and I love being able to change all my font keep up the good work dev team
reviews.author: Valerie Slingerland

reviews.title: Bugs still remain
reviews.comment: Folder icon automatically shrinks after folder is renamed. Sometimes long-press on icon/widget doesn\'t show edit menu or can\'t move. App drawer missing some app icons after reboot and had to restart Dodol for those icons to show. Overall, better than the previous version but still need more fixes
reviews.author: Akamiya Kazuki

reviews.title: Love love love
reviews.comment: This launcher is amazinggggg ! Thanks for made this great lancher ! More themes please :)
reviews.author: erlinda prima

reviews.title: Highly customizable
reviews.comment: Such a great app, heaps of themes available and super easy to use! REALLY wish I could change the icons in the app drawer like I can on the home screen... If you can, I cannot work out how to. Thanks!

reviews.title: Apps
reviews.comment: I love this app soo much and it\'s quicker then my normal homescreen one

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: After the update, I can\'t find my hidden apps anymore. And I noticed that it became slower.
